title: What are some ideas for comparison and contrast essays? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are some broad categories to compare and/or contrast. Two PeopleTwo PlacesTwo Things Largely, it depends on your interests. If you like to “eat out” a lot, compare two restaurants; If you read magazines, compare or contrast two magazines; if you have interest in health care, try two treatments for the same problem. How about two typical types of funeral arrangements: cremation vs burial.Two types of dances.Two ways to skin a squirrel or hunt deer. Compare real crime with crime portrayed on TV.Contrast marriage customs and traditions in China (or any where else) vs those in US. Contrast two similar sports: American Football vs European Football Hope this helps.

Oh, there are tons of them. As I see, you’re not very interested in writing one, so just order it from http://essaywriter4hire.com/ and don’t even think about this. In fact, choosing of topic depends on the direction that’s interesting for you. What are you study, what are your hobbies? If you just don’t love anything, then write something on neutral topic. Something like comparison cat and dog, two programs, two cities, countries, political regimes.
